```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.is.your.favorite.cannabis.strain."
t <- "What is your favorite cannabis strain?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
```

```{r}
write.csv(q_plot, 'output/q56_favorite_strain_120.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(q_data, 'output/q56_favorite_strain_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
